title: Why a gas tax holiday might not be something to celebrate
description: Amid daunting gas prices, President Biden's proposed federal gas tax holiday sounds like a sweet relief. But the economics behind this tax break reveals the push and pull between consumers and oil companies, and an unexpected outcome.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
